name: dharambhushan-portfolio
description: Professional portfolio for Dharam Bhushan - AWS Engineering Manager & AI/ML Solutions Architect

scripts.optimize: npm run optimize:images && npm run optimize:css && npm run optimize:js
scripts.optimize:images: echo 'Image optimization placeholder - use ImageOptim or similar tool'
scripts.optimize:css: npx clean-css-cli -o dist/css/main.min.css css/main.css css/components.css css/themes.css css/animations.css
scripts.optimize:js: npx terser js/main.js js/theme-toggle.js js/animations.js js/analytics.js -o dist/js/bundle.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:s3 && npm run invalidate:cloudflare
scripts.lint: npm run lint:html && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:js
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:css -- --fix && npm run lint:js -- --fix
scripts.validate:all: npm run format:check && npm run lint

author: Dharam Bhushan

*.js: bash -c 'if [[ "$0" != *"eslint.config.js" ]]; then eslint --fix "$0" && prettier --write "$0"; else prettier --write "$0"; fi'
